results.doc_title: PRD: Enabling One-Time-Purchase (OTP) Capabilities for HelloFresh Group
results.project_name: Enabling One-Time-Purchase (OTP) Capabilities for HelloFresh Group
results.summary: This initiative delivers One-Time-Purchase capability across HelloFresh Group brands to address customer needs for order flexibility without subscription commitment. The solution enables customers to purchase seasonal boxes, specialized items (Good Chop), Factor meals, and marketplace products as standalone purchases. Initial 2025 rollouts target Seasonal Boxes, Good Chop offerings, and Factor Form items, with projected incremental TCVA of €24.7M-€28.8M.

must_have: Core Purchase & Checkout Experience - customers can select OTP products, understand full cost upfront, and complete orders
Product discovery and browsing for OTP-eligible items
Distinct OTP cart and checkout processes
Operational & Backend Integration - inventory management to delivery processing
Customer care support for OTP orders
nice_to_have: Enhanced Flexibility for OTP - guest checkout, basic customization, OTP order management
Marketplace & Cross-Sell Specifics - third-party vendor products and Factor cross-sell integration
Advanced Customization for OTP - customized boxes, real-time product availability updates, marketing tools
Combining OTP orders with existing subscriptions
out_of_scope: Full marketplace integration in 2025 (2-Way Marketplace targeted for 2026 PoC Q4 2025)
Complete Factor cross-sell iteration (2026 potential target)

decisions.what: Phased rollout approach starting with Seasonal Boxes, Good Chop, and Factor Form
decisions.rationale: Allows for iterative learning and reduces risk while addressing highest-value use cases first

decisions.what: Consolidate OTP functionality from third-party tools (Shopify) and legacy systems (Evangelist) into core platform
decisions.rationale: Significantly lower costs and operational complexity while improving customer experience

decisions.what: Initial focus on prospect customers for Good Chop Milestone 1, then active customers in Milestone 2
decisions.rationale: Address subscription hesitation feedback and improve reactivation rates progressively

team: TAM (Technical Account Management) - Nikita Gorshkov, Wellney Yarra, Daniel Arias
Consumer Core - Abdelrahman Hussein, Adam Ghanem
Front End team - Alexander Matlin (Main PIC)
Back-end team - Vladyslav Valt, Ahmed ElSebaei (Main PICs)

success_metrics: Seasonal box OTP: €16.5M-€21.5M net revenue potential
Overall customer spend and engagement increase
